alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:01PM CDT until August 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Elba, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Novosel, New Brockton, Lee, Kinston, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Perry Store, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Lucile, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Central City, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Goodman and Camp Alaflo Bsa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
